metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1432 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The message_options function in includes/ucp/ucp_pm_options.php in phpBB before 3.0.13 does not properly validate the form key, which allows remote attackers to conduct CSRF attacks and change the full folder setting via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1432` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpbb3 - 3.0.12-4
phpbb3-l10n - 3.0.12-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpbb3 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.12-4').
